description: Single storey rear extension; single storey infill extension; and replacement of first floor rear timber single-glazed sash window with Juliet Balcony (timber double glazed door)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 01 Basement; 02 Ground Floor Plan; 03 First Floor Plan; 04 Second Floor Plan; 05 Elevations; 06 Sections; S100 Proposed Ground Floor Plan (Rev. C1); 2025-001-11 Proposed Elevations (Rev. A); 2025-001-12 Proposed Material Study (Rev. A); Design and Access Statement prepared by Nell Design Studio; 2025-001-13 Window Replacement Details
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
